long.ar:
أداة الطلاء هي الأداة المثالية لأي شخص يتطلع إلى التعبير عن قدراته الإبداعية. يمكنك الرسم على أي صفحة ويب بسرعة وسهولة وإضافة مستوى جديد من التعبير إلى تجربة التصفح لديك. باستخدام أدوات Painty، يمكنك تحويل أي صفحة ويب إلى لوحة الرسم الخاصة بك. انتقل بإبداعك إلى المستوى التالي باستخدام أداتنا. تتيح لك أداة الطلاء القوية هذه الرسم على أي صفحة ويب باستخدام مجموعة متنوعة من الأدوات والألوان. بالإضافة إلى ذلك، فهو خفيف الوزن وسهل الاستخدام، مما يضيف مستوى جديدًا من الإبداع والتعبير إلى تجربة التصفح لديك. باستخدام Painty، يمكنك إنشاء رسوم توضيحية جميلة وتدوين الملاحظات والاستمتاع بسرعة وسهولة.

استخدام تطبيق Painty بسيط وسهل وممتع، ويمكنك الاستمتاع وتعلم الرسم باستخدام ملحق Chrome هذا. يتميز امتدادنا بتصميم بسيط وسهل الاستخدام. إنها ليست مربكة ويتم استخدام أيقونات الأدوات التي يمكن التعرف عليها بسهولة (قلم رصاص وقلم تمييز وأسهم ودلو طلاء وممحاة وأدوات أخرى) في التطبيق مما يسهل على الجميع استخدامها.

تتضمن أفضل الأدوات المتعددة للطلاء عبر الإنترنت ما يلي:

🖍️ قلم رصاص - ارسم خطًا مخصصًا بعرض الخط ولونه المحددين.
🖌️ أداة التمييز - أسهل طريقة لتمييز النص في أي صفحة ويب.
🎨 منتقي الألوان - اختر لونًا من صفحة الويب أو رسوماتك واستخدمه للرسم.
➖ الخط - ارسم خطًا مستقيمًا بعرض الخط المحدد وشفافيته ولونه.
➡️ السهم - ارسم خطًا مستقيمًا بسهم في نهاية عرض الخط المحدد وشفافيته ولونه.
🔗 خط متعدد الخطوط - أفضل طريقة لرسم شكل عشوائي.
🔳 المستطيل - ارسم مستطيلاً بعرض الخط والشفافية واللون المحدد.
🟡 الدائرة - ارسم دائرة أو شكلًا ناقصًا بعرض الخط والشفافية واللون المحدد.
🔺 المضلع - قم برسم مضلع بعرض الخط المحدد والشفافية واللون.
🔤 النص - أضف نصًا إلى صفحة الويب باللون والشفافية المحددين.
😀 الرموز التعبيرية - أضف رموز تعبيرية ممتعة إلى صفحة الويب.
👁️‍🗨️ طمس - طمس المعلومات الحساسة أو الشخصية على لقطات الشاشة أو الصور.
🧽 الممحاة - امسح جزءًا من رسوماتك.
🎨 دلو الطلاء - املأ المنطقة باللون والشفافية المحددة.
و اكثر!

ولكن هذا ليس كل شيء - باستخدام علامة التبويب Painty New Tab، يمكنك تمكين ميزات إضافية مثل إضافة/إزالة الإشارات المرجعية وتخزين لقطات الشاشة المحفوظة.

كيف يمكنني استخدام لقطات الشاشة؟

لقطات الشاشة ليست مفيدة فحسب، بل إنها أيضًا ثورية لإنجاز المزيد من العمل بشكل أسرع، ويمكن أن تكون مفيدة للغاية عندما تحتاج إلى إظهار شيء قد يكون من الصعب شرحه بالكلمات. يمكن أن تساعدك لقطة الشاشة في إنجاز المزيد من العمل.

1. شارك
هل يريد زميلك في العمل مدخلاتك على صفحة ويب جديدة قام بتجميعها؟ أم أنهم يريدون منك إلقاء نظرة على الكتيب الذي قاموا بطباعته؟ بدلًا من كتابة بريد إلكتروني طويل يحتوي على تعديلات، التقط لقطة شاشة وأبهر زميلك في العمل بتعليقات ممتازة وفعالة.
 
2. اعرض
لا تخبر فقط. يعرض. أظهر بالضبط ما تتحدث عنه من خلال لقطة شاشة. باستخدام لقطة شاشة توضح ما تقصده بالضبط، تقل احتمالية إساءة فهمك. وهذا يعني قدرًا أقل من الارتباك، ووقتًا أقل في الشرح، والمزيد من الوقت في يومك. على سبيل المثال، اشرح لموظف جديد كيفية تسجيل الدخول. وبدلاً من إخباره، يمكنك أن ترسل له بسرعة لقطة شاشة يمكنهم الرجوع إليها مرارًا وتكرارًا دون الحاجة إلى سؤالك بشكل متكرر.
يتم إنشاء لقطة شاشة بخطوات مرقمة بسرعة وسهولة الفهم

3. اعرض
إذا سبق لك أن اتصلت بفريق تكنولوجيا المعلومات أو دعم الويب للإبلاغ عن خطأ ما، فمن المحتمل أن يُطلب منك تقديم لقطة شاشة. وذلك لأن أجهزة الكمبيوتر لدى الجميع ليست متماثلة. اعتمادًا على جهازك ونظام التشغيل الذي يعمل به وإصدار المتصفح الذي تستخدمه، قد تكون الطريقة التي يظهر بها شيء ما بالنسبة لك مختلفة تمامًا بالنسبة للآخرين. إن تقديم مثال مرئي لما تنظر إليه يساعد الآخرين على رؤية ما يحدث بالضبط وتحديد الأخطاء التي قد تحدث.

سواء كنت طالبًا، أو محترفًا، أو مجرد شخص يحب تصفح الويب، فإن Painty هو امتداد لا بد منه. سيكون لديك إمكانية الوصول إلى مجموعة من أدوات التعليقات التوضيحية المتقدمة، بما في ذلك قلم الرصاص وقلم التمييز ومنتقي الألوان والسهم والمضلع والنص والرموز التعبيرية والمزيد. باستخدام Painty، يمكنك بسهولة إنشاء محتوى إعلامي عن طريق رسم أسهم وأشكال عبر الإنترنت تركز على الأجزاء الأكثر أهمية في النص أو موقع الويب. بالإضافة إلى ذلك، يمكنك تحرير المحتوى الموجود على صفحة الويب أو لقطة الشاشة باستخدام أدوات التمويه أو الممحاة أو مجموعة الطلاء.

باختصار، Painty هي أداة شاملة لأي شخص يريد الارتقاء بتجربة تصفح الويب الخاصة به إلى المستوى التالي. جربه اليوم وشاهد بنفسك مدى سهولة إضافة تعليقات توضيحية إلى أي صفحة ويب وتخصيصها!

نحن نقدر ملاحظاتك! يكرس فريقنا جهوده لتقديم أفضل تجربة ممكنة لمتصفح Chrome. إذا وجدت امتدادنا مفيدًا، فيرجى التفكير في منحه تصنيف 5 نجوم.

English version:

Web Paint is one of the best painting and drawing tools for Chrome! Draw beautiful drawings to unleash your creativity and entertain yourself at the same time. It's simple and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this app. Web Paint Tool is a lightweight and completely free Chrome extension that can be used for educational purposes and for introducing anyone to drawing right from your browser. It can be used to practice the alphabet and numbers and paintings while educating.

This tool has a simple and easy-to-use design. It is not confusing and easily recognisable icons are used in the app which makes it easy and quite simple to use. This is a single-screen and one-click app, you land on the app and can start using it as soon as you click on the app logo, no annoying welcome screens or button clicks are required to start working on the app.

Painty key features

- Paint is one of the best painting or drawing apps to unleash their creativity.
- You can draw beautiful pictures.
- Using Paint you can save and share the picture through social media.
- Offers multiple brush and eraser sizes for a great experience.
- Lightweight paint tool that hardly takes any space on your device.

Paint Tool is a free tool to create various drawings that come loaded with brushes, fonts, shapes, and other resources. Simple, easy, and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this Chrome extension.

Our Paint Tool extension has a simple and easy-to-use design. It is not confusing and easily recognizable tool icons  (pencil, paint bucket, eraser, and other tools) are used in the app which makes it easy for everyone to use. Paint directly online or add information on a webpage to highlight moments, then take a screenshot of a full webpage or just a selected area with an option to download or share it. 

What is a screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. Some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new-age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple of months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use screenshots?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster. About the belief that screenshots can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshots can help you get more work done:

1. Collaborate with others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate steps to perform a function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. For example, explain to a new employee how to log in. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.

3. Show exactly what’s happening
If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, and the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

- Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
- Showcasing software for a review.
- Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
- Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
- Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

Note: After installation/updating Painty Tool, please reload the active tabs in your browser for the extension to work.
long.am:
የቀለም መሣሪያ የፈጠራ ችሎታቸውን ለመግለጽ ለሚፈልግ ለማንኛውም ሰው ፍጹም መሣሪያ ነው። በማንኛውም ድረ-ገጽ ላይ በፍጥነት እና በቀላሉ ይሳሉ እና በአሰሳ ተሞክሮዎ ላይ አዲስ የመግለፅ ደረጃ ያክሉ። በPainty መሳሪያዎች ማንኛውንም ድረ-ገጽ ወደ ሸራዎ መቀየር ይችላሉ። በመሳሪያችን ፈጠራዎን ወደ ላቀ ደረጃ ይውሰዱት። ይህ ኃይለኛ የቀለም መሳሪያ በተለያዩ መሳሪያዎች እና ቀለሞች በማንኛውም ድረ-ገጽ ላይ ለመሳል ያስችልዎታል. በተጨማሪም፣ ክብደቱ ቀላል እና ለመጠቀም ቀላል ነው፣ ይህም አዲስ የፈጠራ ደረጃን እና የአሰሳ ተሞክሮን ይጨምራል። በ Painty በፍጥነት እና በቀላሉ የሚያምሩ ምሳሌዎችን መፍጠር፣ ማስታወሻ መያዝ እና መዝናናት ይችላሉ።

የፔይንቲ መተግበሪያን ለመጠቀም ቀላል፣ ቀላል እና አስደሳች፣ በዚህ የChrome ቅጥያ መደሰት እና መሳል መማር ይችላሉ። የእኛ ቅጥያ ቀላል እና ለአጠቃቀም ቀላል የሆነ ንድፍ አለው። ግራ የሚያጋባ አይደለም እና በቀላሉ ሊታወቁ የሚችሉ የመሳሪያ አዶዎች (እርሳስ፣ ማድመቂያ፣ ቀስቶች፣ የቀለም ባልዲ፣ ማጥፊያ እና ሌሎች መሳሪያዎች) በመተግበሪያው ውስጥ ጥቅም ላይ ይውላሉ ይህም ለሁሉም ሰው ለመጠቀም ቀላል ያደርገዋል።

በመስመር ላይ ለመሳል በጣም ጥሩው ባለብዙ መሣሪያ የሚከተሉትን ያጠቃልላል

🖍️ እርሳስ - ከተመረጠው መስመር ስፋት እና ቀለም ጋር ብጁ መስመር ይሳሉ።
🖌️ Highlighter - በማንኛውም ድረ-ገጽ ላይ ጽሑፍን ለማድመቅ ቀላሉ መንገድ።
🎨 ቀለም መራጭ - ከድረ-ገጹ ወይም ከሥዕሎችዎ ላይ ቀለም ይምረጡ እና ለመሳል ይጠቀሙበት።
➖ መስመር - ከተመረጠው መስመር ስፋት፣ ግልጽነት እና ቀለም ጋር ቀጥ ያለ መስመር ይሳሉ።
➡️ ቀስት - በተመረጠው መስመር ወርድ፣ ግልጽነት እና ቀለም መጨረሻ ላይ ቀጥ ያለ መስመር በቀስት ይሳሉ።
🔗 ፖሊላይን - የዘፈቀደ ምስል ለመሳል ምርጡ መንገድ።
🔳 ሬክታንግል - ከተመረጠው የመስመር ስፋት፣ ግልጽነት እና ቀለም ጋር አራት ማዕዘን ይሳሉ።
🟡 ክበብ - ከተመረጠው የመስመር ስፋት፣ ግልጽነት እና ቀለም ጋር ክብ ወይም ሞላላ ይሳሉ።
🔺 ፖሊጎን - ከተመረጠው የመስመር ስፋት፣ ግልጽነት እና ቀለም ጋር አንድ ባለ ብዙ ጎን ይሳሉ።
🔤 ጽሑፍ - በተመረጠው ቀለም እና ግልጽነት ወደ ድረ-ገጹ ጽሑፍ ያክሉ።
😀 ስሜት ገላጭ ምስል - አስደሳች ስሜት ገላጭ ምስል ወደ ድረ-ገጹ ያክሉ።
👁️‍🗨️ ብዥታ - ሚስጥራዊነት ያለው ወይም የግል መረጃን በቅጽበታዊ ገጽ እይታዎች ወይም ምስሎች ላይ ማደብዘዝ።
🧽 ኢሬዘር - የስዕሎችዎን ክፍል ያጥፉ።
🎨 የቀለም ባልዲ - ቦታውን በተመረጠው ቀለም እና ግልጽነት ይሙሉ።
ሌሎችም!

ግን ያ ብቻ አይደለም - በ Painty New Tab፣ እንደ ዕልባቶችን ማከል/ማስወገድ እና የተቀመጡ ቅጽበታዊ ገጽ እይታዎችን ማከማቸት ያሉ ተጨማሪ ባህሪያትን ማንቃት ይችላሉ።

ቅጽበታዊ ገጽ እይታዎችን እንዴት መጠቀም እችላለሁ?

ቅጽበታዊ ገጽ እይታዎች ምቹ ብቻ አይደሉም፣ ተጨማሪ ስራ ለመስራት፣ በፍጥነት፣ በቃላት ለማብራራት የሚከብድ ነገር ማሳየት ሲፈልጉ አብዮታዊ ናቸው። ቅጽበታዊ ገጽ እይታ ተጨማሪ ስራዎችን እንዲሰሩ ይረዳዎታል።

1. አጋራ
የስራ ባልደረባዎ ባሰባሰቡት አዲስ ድረ-ገጽ ላይ የእርስዎን ግብአት ይፈልጋሉ? ወይስ እነሱ ያሳተሙትን ብሮሹር እንድትመለከት ይፈልጋሉ? ረጅም ኢሜል ከአርትዖቶች ጋር ከመጻፍ ይልቅ ቅጽበታዊ ገጽ እይታን ያንሱ እና የስራ ባልደረባዎትን በጣም ጥሩ እና ቀልጣፋ ግብረመልስ ያግኙት።
 
2. አሳይ
ዝም ብለህ አትናገር። አሳይ። በትክክል ስለምትናገረው ነገር በቅጽበታዊ ገጽ እይታ አሳይ። በትክክል ምን ለማለት እንደፈለጉ የሚያሳይ ቅጽበታዊ ገጽ እይታን በመጠቀም፣ እርስዎ በተሳሳተ መንገድ የመረዳት እድልዎ አነስተኛ ነው። እና ይሄ ማለት ግራ መጋባት ይቀንሳል፣ የማብራራት ጊዜ ይቀንሳል እና በእርስዎ ቀን ውስጥ ብዙ ጊዜ ይመለሳሉ። ለምሳሌ ለአዲስ ሰራተኛ እንዴት እንደሚገቡ ያስረዱ።እነሱን ከመንገር ይልቅ እርስዎን ደጋግመው ሳይጠይቁዎት ደጋግመው የሚጠቅሱትን ስክሪንሾት በፍጥነት መላክ ይችላሉ።
ቁጥር ያላቸው ደረጃዎች ያሉት ቅጽበታዊ ገጽ እይታ ለመስራት ፈጣን እና ለመረዳት ቀላል ነው።

3. አሳይ
ስህተትን ሪፖርት ለማድረግ የእርስዎን የአይቲ ወይም የድር ድጋፍ ቡድን አነጋግረው ከሆነ፣ ቅጽበታዊ ገጽ እይታ እንዲያቀርቡ ተጠይቀው ሊሆን ይችላል። የሁሉም ሰው ኮምፒውተር አንድ አይነት ስላልሆነ ነው። እንደ ማሽንዎ፣ እየሄደ ባለው ስርዓተ ክወና እና እርስዎ ባሉበት የአሳሽ ስሪት ላይ በመመስረት አንድ ነገር ለእርስዎ የሚታይበት መንገድ ለሌሎች ፍጹም የተለየ ሊሆን ይችላል። እርስዎ የሚመለከቱትን ምስላዊ ምሳሌ መስጠት ሌሎች ምን እየተካሄደ እንዳለ በትክክል እንዲያዩ እና ምን እየተከሰተ እንዳለ ለመለየት ይረዳል።

ተማሪ፣ ባለሙያ፣ ወይም ድሩን ማሰስ የሚወድ ሰው፣ Painty የግድ የግድ ቅጥያ ነው። እርሳስ፣ ማድመቂያ፣ ቀለም መራጭ፣ ቀስት፣ ባለብዙ ጎን፣ ጽሑፍ፣ ስሜት ገላጭ ምስል እና ሌሎችንም ጨምሮ የተለያዩ የላቁ የማብራሪያ መሳሪያዎችን ማግኘት ይኖርዎታል። በ Painty በመስመር ላይ ቀስቶችን እና ቅርጾችን በመሳል በአንድ ጽሑፍ ወይም ድህረ ገጽ ላይ በጣም አስፈላጊ በሆኑ ክፍሎች ላይ በቀላሉ መረጃ ሰጭ ይዘት መፍጠር ይችላሉ። በተጨማሪም፣ ይዘቱን በድረ-ገጹ ላይ ወይም በቅጽበታዊ ገጽ እይታው ላይ በማደብዘዣ፣ በማጥፋት ወይም በቀለም ባልዲ መሳሪያዎች ማርትዕ ይችላሉ።

በአጭሩ፣ Painty የድር አሰሳ ልምዳቸውን ወደ ላቀ ደረጃ ለማድረስ ለሚፈልግ ሁሉ ሁሉን አቀፍ መሳሪያ ነው። ዛሬ ይሞክሩት እና ማንኛውንም ድረ-ገጽ ለማብራራት እና ለማበጀት ምን ያህል ቀላል እንደሆነ ለራስዎ ይመልከቱ!

የእርስዎን አስተያየት ዋጋ እንሰጣለን! ቡድናችን የሚቻለውን የChrome ተሞክሮ ለእርስዎ ለማቅረብ ቆርጦ ተነስቷል። የእኛን ቅጥያ አጋዥ ሆኖ ካገኙት፣ እባክዎን ባለ 5-ኮከብ ደረጃ መስጠት ያስቡበት።

English version:

Web Paint is one of the best painting and drawing tools for Chrome! Draw beautiful drawings to unleash your creativity and entertain yourself at the same time. It's simple and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this app. Web Paint Tool is a lightweight and completely free Chrome extension that can be used for educational purposes and for introducing anyone to drawing right from your browser. It can be used to practice the alphabet and numbers and paintings while educating.

This tool has a simple and easy-to-use design. It is not confusing and easily recognisable icons are used in the app which makes it easy and quite simple to use. This is a single-screen and one-click app, you land on the app and can start using it as soon as you click on the app logo, no annoying welcome screens or button clicks are required to start working on the app.

Painty key features

- Paint is one of the best painting or drawing apps to unleash their creativity.
- You can draw beautiful pictures.
- Using Paint you can save and share the picture through social media.
- Offers multiple brush and eraser sizes for a great experience.
- Lightweight paint tool that hardly takes any space on your device.

Paint Tool is a free tool to create various drawings that come loaded with brushes, fonts, shapes, and other resources. Simple, easy, and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this Chrome extension.

Our Paint Tool extension has a simple and easy-to-use design. It is not confusing and easily recognizable tool icons  (pencil, paint bucket, eraser, and other tools) are used in the app which makes it easy for everyone to use. Paint directly online or add information on a webpage to highlight moments, then take a screenshot of a full webpage or just a selected area with an option to download or share it. 

What is a screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. Some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new-age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple of months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use screenshots?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster. About the belief that screenshots can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshots can help you get more work done:

1. Collaborate with others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate steps to perform a function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. For example, explain to a new employee how to log in. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.

3. Show exactly what’s happening
If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, and the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

- Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
- Showcasing software for a review.
- Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
- Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
- Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

Note: After installation/updating Painty Tool, please reload the active tabs in your browser for the extension to work.
long.bg:
Paint Tool е идеалният инструмент за всеки, който иска да изрази своята креативност. Рисувайте върху всяка уеб страница бързо и лесно и добавете ново ниво на изразяване към изживяването си при сърфиране. С инструментите на Painty можете да превърнете всяка уеб страница във свое платно. Издигнете креативността си на следващото ниво с нашия инструмент. Този мощен инструмент за рисуване ви позволява да рисувате върху всяка уеб страница с различни инструменти и цветове. Плюс това, той е лек и лесен за използване, добавяйки ново ниво на креативност и изразяване към изживяването ви при сърфиране. С Painty можете бързо и лесно да създавате красиви илюстрации, да си водите бележки и да се забавлявате.

Лесно, лесно и забавно за използване приложението Painty, можете да се насладите и да научите да рисувате с това разширение за Chrome. Нашето разширение има прост и лесен за използване дизайн. Не е объркващо и в приложението се използват лесно разпознаваеми икони на инструменти (молив, маркер, стрелки, кофа за боя, гумичка и други инструменти), което го прави лесно за използване от всички.

Най-добрият многофункционален инструмент за боя онлайн включва:

🖍️ Молив - начертайте персонализирана линия с избраната ширина и цвят на линията.
🖌️ Маркиращ инструмент - най-лесният начин за маркиране на текст на всяка уеб страница.
🎨 Избор на цвят - изберете цвят от уеб страницата или вашите рисунки и го използвайте за рисуване.
➖ Линия - нарисувайте права линия с избраната ширина на линията, прозрачност и цвят.
➡️ Стрелка - нарисувайте права линия със стрелка в края на избраната ширина на линията, прозрачност и цвят.
🔗 Полилиния - най-добрият начин за рисуване на произволна фигура.
🔳 Правоъгълник - начертайте правоъгълник с избраната ширина на линията, прозрачност и цвят.
🟡 Кръг - начертайте кръг или елипса с избраната ширина на линията, прозрачност и цвят.
🔺 Многоъгълник - рисувайте многоъгълник с избраната ширина на линията, прозрачност и цвят.
🔤 Текст - добавете текст към уеб страницата с избрания цвят и прозрачност.
😀 Емоджи - добавете забавни емоджи към уеб страницата.
👁️‍🗨️ Blur - замъгляване на чувствителна или лична информация на екранни снимки или изображения.
🧽 Eraser - изтрийте част от вашите рисунки.
🎨 Paint Bucket - запълнете област с избран цвят и прозрачност.
и още!

Но това не е всичко - с новия раздел Painty можете да активирате допълнителни функции като добавяне/премахване на отметки и съхраняване на запазени екранни снимки.

Как мога да използвам екранни снимки?

Екранните снимки не са само удобни, те са и революционни, за да свършите повече работа, по-бързо, те могат да бъдат изключително полезни, когато трябва да демонстрирате нещо, което иначе би било трудно да се обясни с думи. Екранна снимка може да ви помогне да свършите повече работа.

1. Споделете
Вашият колега иска ли вашето мнение за нова уеб страница, която е създал? Или трябва да прегледате брошура, която са отпечатали? Вместо да пишете дълъг имейл с редакции, направете екранна снимка и удивете колегата си с отлична, ефективна обратна връзка.
 
2. Демонстрирайте
Не просто казвайте. Покажи. Демонстрирайте точно това, за което говорите, с екранна снимка. Като използвате екранна снимка, която показва точно какво имате предвид, има по-малък шанс да бъдете неразбрани. А това означава по-малко объркване, по-малко време за обяснение и повече време назад в деня ви. Например, обяснете на нов служител как да влезе. Вместо да му кажете, можете бързо да му изпратите екранна снимка, която да препраща отново и отново, без да се налага многократно да ви пита.
Екранна снимка с номерирани стъпки се прави бързо и е лесна за разбиране

3. Покажете
Ако някога сте се свързвали с вашия ИТ или уеб екип за поддръжка, за да съобщите за грешка, вероятно сте били помолени да предоставите екранна снимка. Това е така, защото не всеки компютър е еднакъв. В зависимост от вашата машина, операционната система, която изпълнява, и версията на браузъра, на която работите, начинът, по който нещо изглежда за вас, може да е напълно различен за другите. Предоставянето на визуален пример за това, което гледате, помага на другите да видят точно какво се случва и да идентифицират какво може да се обърка.

Независимо дали сте студент, професионалист или просто някой, който обича да сърфира в мрежата, Painty е задължително разширение. Ще имате достъп до набор от усъвършенствани инструменти за анотации, включително молив, маркер, инструмент за избор на цвят, стрелка, многоъгълник, текст, емотикони и други. С Painty можете лесно да създавате информативно съдържание, като рисувате онлайн стрелки и форми, които се фокусират върху най-важните части от текст или уебсайт. Освен това можете да редактирате съдържанието на уеб страницата или екранната снимка с инструментите за размазване, изтриване или кофа за рисуване.

Накратко, Painty е инструмент "всичко в едно" за всеки, който иска да пренесе изживяването си при сърфиране в мрежата на следващото ниво. Изпробвайте го днес и се уверете сами колко лесно е да коментирате и персонализирате всяка уеб страница!

Ние ценим вашите отзиви! Нашият екип се е посветил на това да ви предложи възможно най-доброто изживяване с Chrome. Ако намирате нашето разширение за полезно, моля, помислете дали да му дадете оценка от 5 звезди.

English version:

Web Paint is one of the best painting and drawing tools for Chrome! Draw beautiful drawings to unleash your creativity and entertain yourself at the same time. It's simple and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this app. Web Paint Tool is a lightweight and completely free Chrome extension that can be used for educational purposes and for introducing anyone to drawing right from your browser. It can be used to practice the alphabet and numbers and paintings while educating.

This tool has a simple and easy-to-use design. It is not confusing and easily recognisable icons are used in the app which makes it easy and quite simple to use. This is a single-screen and one-click app, you land on the app and can start using it as soon as you click on the app logo, no annoying welcome screens or button clicks are required to start working on the app.

Painty key features

- Paint is one of the best painting or drawing apps to unleash their creativity.
- You can draw beautiful pictures.
- Using Paint you can save and share the picture through social media.
- Offers multiple brush and eraser sizes for a great experience.
- Lightweight paint tool that hardly takes any space on your device.

Paint Tool is a free tool to create various drawings that come loaded with brushes, fonts, shapes, and other resources. Simple, easy, and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this Chrome extension.

Our Paint Tool extension has a simple and easy-to-use design. It is not confusing and easily recognizable tool icons  (pencil, paint bucket, eraser, and other tools) are used in the app which makes it easy for everyone to use. Paint directly online or add information on a webpage to highlight moments, then take a screenshot of a full webpage or just a selected area with an option to download or share it. 

What is a screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. Some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new-age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple of months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use screenshots?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster. About the belief that screenshots can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshots can help you get more work done:

1. Collaborate with others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate steps to perform a function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. For example, explain to a new employee how to log in. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.

3. Show exactly what’s happening
If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, and the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

- Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
- Showcasing software for a review.
- Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
- Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
- Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

Note: After installation/updating Painty Tool, please reload the active tabs in your browser for the extension to work.

যারা তাদের সৃজনশীলতা প্রকাশ করতে চাইছেন তাদের জন্য পেইন্ট টুল হল নিখুঁত টুল। দ্রুত এবং সহজে যেকোনো ওয়েব পৃষ্ঠায় আঁকুন এবং আপনার ব্রাউজিং অভিজ্ঞতায় অভিব্যক্তির একটি নতুন স্তর যোগ করুন। পেইন্টি টুলের সাহায্যে আপনি যেকোনো ওয়েব পেজকে আপনার ক্যানভাসে পরিণত করতে পারেন। আমাদের টুল দিয়ে আপনার সৃজনশীলতাকে পরবর্তী স্তরে নিয়ে যান। এই শক্তিশালী পেইন্ট টুল আপনাকে বিভিন্ন ধরনের টুল এবং রঙের সাথে যেকোনো ওয়েব পেজে আঁকার অনুমতি দেয়। এছাড়াও, এটি হালকা ওজনের এবং ব্যবহার করা সহজ, আপনার ব্রাউজিং অভিজ্ঞতায় সৃজনশীলতা এবং অভিব্যক্তির একটি নতুন স্তর যোগ করে৷ পেইন্টির সাহায্যে, আপনি দ্রুত এবং সহজেই সুন্দর চিত্র তৈরি করতে, নোট নিতে এবং মজা করতে পারেন।

Painty অ্যাপ ব্যবহার করা সহজ, সহজ এবং মজাদার, আপনি এই ক্রোম এক্সটেনশনে অঙ্কন উপভোগ করতে এবং শিখতে পারেন। আমাদের এক্সটেনশনের একটি সহজ এবং সহজেই ব্যবহারযোগ্য ডিজাইন রয়েছে। এটি বিভ্রান্তিকর নয় এবং সহজে চেনা যায় এমন টুল আইকন (পেন্সিল, হাইলাইটার, তীর, পেইন্ট বাকেট, ইরেজার এবং অন্যান্য টুল) অ্যাপটিতে ব্যবহার করা হয় যা প্রত্যেকের জন্য ব্যবহার করা সহজ করে তোলে।

অনলাইন পেইন্টের জন্য সেরা মাল্টিটুলের মধ্যে রয়েছে:

🖍️ পেন্সিল - নির্বাচিত লাইনের প্রস্থ এবং রঙ দিয়ে একটি কাস্টম লাইন আঁকুন।
🖌️ হাইলাইটার - যেকোনো ওয়েবপেজে টেক্সট হাইলাইট করার সবচেয়ে সহজ উপায়।
🎨 রঙ চয়নকারী - ওয়েব পৃষ্ঠা বা আপনার অঙ্কন থেকে একটি রঙ চয়ন করুন এবং এটি অঙ্কনের জন্য ব্যবহার করুন।
➖ লাইন - নির্বাচিত রেখার প্রস্থ, স্বচ্ছতা এবং রঙ দিয়ে একটি সরল রেখা আঁকুন।
➡️ তীর - নির্বাচিত লাইনের প্রস্থ, স্বচ্ছতা এবং রঙের শেষে একটি তীর দিয়ে একটি সরল রেখা আঁকুন।
🔗 পলিলাইন - একটি নির্বিচারে চিত্র আঁকার সেরা উপায়।
🔳 আয়তক্ষেত্র - নির্বাচিত রেখার প্রস্থ, স্বচ্ছতা এবং রঙ সহ একটি আয়তক্ষেত্র আঁকুন।
🟡 বৃত্ত - নির্বাচিত রেখার প্রস্থ, স্বচ্ছতা এবং রঙ সহ একটি বৃত্ত বা একটি উপবৃত্ত আঁকুন।
🔺 বহুভুজ - নির্বাচিত রেখার প্রস্থ, স্বচ্ছতা এবং রঙ দিয়ে একটি বহুভুজ আঁকুন।
🔤 পাঠ্য - নির্বাচিত রঙ এবং স্বচ্ছতার সাথে ওয়েব পৃষ্ঠায় পাঠ্য যোগ করুন।
😀 ইমোজি - ওয়েব পেজে মজাদার ইমোজি যোগ করুন।
👁️‍🗨️ ব্লার - স্ক্রিনশট বা ছবিতে সংবেদনশীল বা ব্যক্তিগত তথ্য ঝাপসা করা।
🧽 ইরেজার - আপনার আঁকার অংশ মুছে ফেলুন।
🎨 পেইন্ট বালতি - নির্বাচিত রঙ এবং স্বচ্ছতা দিয়ে একটি এলাকা পূরণ করুন।
এবং আরো!

তবে এটিই সব নয় - পেইন্টি নতুন ট্যাবের সাথে, আপনি বুকমার্ক যোগ/মুছে ফেলা এবং সংরক্ষিত স্ক্রিনশট সংরক্ষণের মতো অতিরিক্ত বৈশিষ্ট্যগুলি সক্ষম করতে পারেন৷

আমি কিভাবে স্ক্রিনশট ব্যবহার করতে পারি?

স্ক্রিনশটগুলি কেবল সহজ নয়, তারা আরও কাজ করার জন্যও বৈপ্লবিক, দ্রুত, যখন আপনাকে এমন কিছু প্রদর্শন করতে হবে যা অন্যথায় শব্দে ব্যাখ্যা করা কঠিন হবে তখন তারা অত্যন্ত সহায়ক হতে পারে। একটি স্ক্রিনশট আপনাকে আরও কাজ করতে সাহায্য করতে পারে।

1. শেয়ার করুন
আপনার সহকর্মী কি একটি নতুন ওয়েবপৃষ্ঠাতে আপনার ইনপুট চান যা তারা একসাথে রেখেছে? নাকি তারা মুদ্রিত একটি ব্রোশিওর দেখার জন্য আপনার কি প্রয়োজন? সম্পাদনা সহ একটি দীর্ঘ ইমেল লেখার পরিবর্তে, একটি স্ক্রিনশট নিন এবং চমৎকার, দক্ষ প্রতিক্রিয়ার সাথে আপনার সহকর্মীকে বাহ।
 
2. প্রদর্শন করুন
শুধু বলবেন না। দেখান। আপনি একটি স্ক্রিনশট দিয়ে ঠিক কি বিষয়ে কথা বলছেন তা প্রদর্শন করুন। একটি স্ক্রিনশট ব্যবহার করে যা দেখায় যে আপনি ঠিক কী বলতে চাচ্ছেন, আপনার ভুল বোঝার সম্ভাবনা কম। এবং এর অর্থ হল কম বিভ্রান্তি, কম সময় ব্যাখ্যা করা এবং আপনার দিনে আরও বেশি সময়। উদাহরণস্বরূপ, একজন নতুন কর্মচারীকে কীভাবে লগ ইন করতে হবে তা ব্যাখ্যা করুন৷ তাদের বলার পরিবর্তে, আপনি তাদের দ্রুত একটি স্ক্রিনশট পাঠাতে পারেন যা তারা আপনাকে বারবার জিজ্ঞাসা না করেই বারবার উল্লেখ করতে পারে৷
সংখ্যাযুক্ত পদক্ষেপ সহ একটি স্ক্রিনশট তৈরি করা দ্রুত এবং বোঝা সহজ

3. দেখান
আপনি যদি কখনও একটি বাগ রিপোর্ট করার জন্য আপনার আইটি বা ওয়েব সাপোর্ট টিমের সাথে যোগাযোগ করে থাকেন, তাহলে সম্ভবত আপনাকে একটি স্ক্রিনশট প্রদান করতে বলা হয়েছে। কারণ সবার কম্পিউটার এক নয়। আপনার মেশিন, এটি যে অপারেটিং সিস্টেমটি চলছে এবং আপনি যে ব্রাউজার সংস্করণে আছেন তার উপর নির্ভর করে, আপনার জন্য যেভাবে কিছু প্রদর্শিত হবে তা অন্যদের জন্য সম্পূর্ণ আলাদা হতে পারে। আপনি যা দেখছেন তার একটি চাক্ষুষ উদাহরণ প্রদান করা অন্যদের ঠিক কী ঘটছে তা দেখতে এবং কী ভুল হতে পারে তা শনাক্ত করতে সাহায্য করে।

আপনি একজন ছাত্র, একজন পেশাদার, বা ওয়েব ব্রাউজ করতে ভালবাসেন এমন কেউই হোন না কেন, পেন্টি অবশ্যই একটি এক্সটেনশন। আপনি একটি পেন্সিল, হাইলাইটার, রঙ চয়নকারী, তীর, বহুভুজ, পাঠ্য, ইমোজি এবং আরও অনেক কিছু সহ উন্নত টীকা সরঞ্জামগুলির একটি অ্যারেতে অ্যাক্সেস পাবেন৷ Painty-এর মাধ্যমে, আপনি অনলাইন তীর এবং আকারগুলি অঙ্কন করে সহজেই তথ্যপূর্ণ সামগ্রী তৈরি করতে পারেন যা একটি পাঠ্য বা ওয়েবসাইটের সবচেয়ে গুরুত্বপূর্ণ অংশগুলিতে ফোকাস করে৷ এছাড়াও, আপনি ব্লার, ইরেজার বা পেইন্ট বাকেট টুলের সাহায্যে ওয়েব পৃষ্ঠা বা স্ক্রিনশটের বিষয়বস্তু সম্পাদনা করতে পারেন।

সংক্ষেপে, যারা তাদের ওয়েব ব্রাউজিং অভিজ্ঞতাকে পরবর্তী স্তরে নিয়ে যেতে চায় তাদের জন্য পেইন্টি হল একটি সর্বাত্মক টুল। আজই এটি ব্যবহার করে দেখুন এবং নিজের জন্য দেখুন যে কোনও ওয়েবপৃষ্ঠা টীকা এবং কাস্টমাইজ করা কতটা সহজ!

আমরা আপনার প্রতিক্রিয়া মূল্য! আমাদের টিম আপনাকে সম্ভাব্য সেরা Chrome অভিজ্ঞতা দেওয়ার জন্য নিবেদিত৷ আপনি যদি আমাদের এক্সটেনশনটি সহায়ক বলে মনে করেন, দয়া করে এটিকে 5-স্টার রেটিং দেওয়ার কথা বিবেচনা করুন।

English version:

Web Paint is one of the best painting and drawing tools for Chrome! Draw beautiful drawings to unleash your creativity and entertain yourself at the same time. It's simple and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this app. Web Paint Tool is a lightweight and completely free Chrome extension that can be used for educational purposes and for introducing anyone to drawing right from your browser. It can be used to practice the alphabet and numbers and paintings while educating.

This tool has a simple and easy-to-use design. It is not confusing and easily recognisable icons are used in the app which makes it easy and quite simple to use. This is a single-screen and one-click app, you land on the app and can start using it as soon as you click on the app logo, no annoying welcome screens or button clicks are required to start working on the app.

Painty key features

- Paint is one of the best painting or drawing apps to unleash their creativity.
- You can draw beautiful pictures.
- Using Paint you can save and share the picture through social media.
- Offers multiple brush and eraser sizes for a great experience.
- Lightweight paint tool that hardly takes any space on your device.

Paint Tool is a free tool to create various drawings that come loaded with brushes, fonts, shapes, and other resources. Simple, easy, and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this Chrome extension.

Our Paint Tool extension has a simple and easy-to-use design. It is not confusing and easily recognizable tool icons  (pencil, paint bucket, eraser, and other tools) are used in the app which makes it easy for everyone to use. Paint directly online or add information on a webpage to highlight moments, then take a screenshot of a full webpage or just a selected area with an option to download or share it. 

What is a screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. Some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new-age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple of months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use screenshots?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster. About the belief that screenshots can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshots can help you get more work done:

1. Collaborate with others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate steps to perform a function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. For example, explain to a new employee how to log in. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.

3. Show exactly what’s happening
If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, and the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

- Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
- Showcasing software for a review.
- Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
- Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
- Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

Note: After installation/updating Painty Tool, please reload the active tabs in your browser for the extension to work.
long.ca:
Paint Tool és l'eina perfecta per a qualsevol persona que vulgui expressar la seva creativitat. Dibuixa en qualsevol pàgina web de manera ràpida i senzilla i afegeix un nou nivell d'expressió a la teva experiència de navegació. Amb les eines de Painty, podeu convertir qualsevol pàgina web en el vostre llenç. Porta la teva creativitat al següent nivell amb la nostra eina. Aquesta potent eina de pintura us permet dibuixar a qualsevol pàgina web amb una varietat d'eines i colors. A més, és lleuger i fàcil d'utilitzar, afegint un nou nivell de creativitat i expressió a la vostra experiència de navegació. Amb Painty, podeu crear de forma ràpida i senzilla il·lustracions boniques, prendre notes i divertir-vos.

Simple, fàcil i divertit d'utilitzar l'aplicació Painty, podeu gaudir i aprendre dibuixant amb aquesta extensió de Chrome. La nostra extensió té un disseny senzill i fàcil d'utilitzar. No és confús i les icones d'eines fàcilment recognoscibles (llapis, marcador, fletxes, galleda de pintura, goma d'esborrar i altres eines) s'utilitzen a l'aplicació, cosa que fa que sigui fàcil d'utilitzar per a tothom.

La millor multieina per pintar en línia inclou:

🖍️ Llapis: dibuixa una línia personalitzada amb l'amplada i el color seleccionats.
🖌️ Ressaltat: la manera més senzilla de ressaltar text a qualsevol pàgina web.
🎨 Selector de colors: tria un color de la pàgina web o dels teus dibuixos i fes-lo servir per dibuixar.
➖ Línia: pinta una línia recta amb l'amplada de línia seleccionada, la transparència i el color.
➡️ Fletxa: pinta una línia recta amb una fletxa al final de l'amplada de línia seleccionada, la transparència i el color.
🔗 Polyline: la millor manera de pintar una figura arbitrària.
🔳 Rectangle: dibuixa un rectangle amb l'amplada de línia, la transparència i el color seleccionats.
🟡 Cercle: dibuixa un cercle o una el·lipse amb l'amplada de línia, la transparència i el color seleccionats.
🔺 Polígon: pinta un polígon amb l'amplada de línia, la transparència i el color seleccionats.
🔤 Text: afegeix text a la pàgina web amb el color i la transparència seleccionats.
😀 Emoji: afegeix un emoji divertit a la pàgina web.
👁️‍🗨️ Desenfocament: desenfoca informació personal o sensible a captures de pantalla o imatges.
🧽 Goma d'esborrar: esborra part dels teus dibuixos.
🎨 Cubeta de pintura: omple una àrea amb el color i la transparència seleccionats.
i més!

Però això no és tot: amb la pestanya nova de Painty, podeu habilitar funcions addicionals, com ara afegir/eliminar adreces d'interès i emmagatzemar captures de pantalla desades.

Com puc utilitzar les captures de pantalla?

Les captures de pantalla no només són útils, també són revolucionàries per fer més feina, més ràpidament, poden ser molt útils quan necessiteu demostrar alguna cosa que, d'altra manera, seria difícil d'explicar amb paraules. Una captura de pantalla us pot ajudar a fer més feina.

1. Comparteix
El teu company de feina vol la teva aportació sobre una pàgina web nova que han creat? O necessiten que mireu un fulletó que estan imprimint? En lloc d'escriure un correu electrònic llarg amb modificacions, feu una captura de pantalla i sorpreneu el vostre company de feina amb un comentari excel·lent i eficient.
 
2. Demostrar
No diguis només. Espectacle. Demostra exactament de què estàs parlant amb una captura de pantalla. Si utilitzeu una captura de pantalla que mostri exactament el que voleu dir, hi ha menys possibilitats que us malentenguin. I això significa menys confusió, menys temps per explicar i més temps al dia. Per exemple, expliqueu a un nou empleat com iniciar sessió. En lloc de dir-li-li, podeu enviar-li ràpidament una captura de pantalla a la qual pugui fer referència una i altra vegada sense haver de demanar-vos-ho repetidament.
Una captura de pantalla amb passos numerats és ràpid de fer i fàcil d'entendre

3. Mostra
Si alguna vegada us heu posat en contacte amb el vostre equip d'assistència informàtica o web per informar d'un error, és probable que us hagin demanat que proporcioneu una captura de pantalla. Això és perquè no tots els ordinadors són iguals. Depenent de la vostra màquina, del sistema operatiu que s'executa i de la versió del navegador en què us trobeu, la manera com us apareixerà alguna cosa podria ser completament diferent per als altres. Proporcionar un exemple visual del que esteu mirant ajuda els altres a veure exactament què està passant i identificar què podria estar malament.

Tant si sou un estudiant, un professional o només algú a qui li agrada navegar per la web, Painty és una extensió imprescindible. Tindràs accés a una sèrie d'eines d'anotació avançades, com ara un llapis, un marcador, un selector de colors, una fletxa, un polígon, un text, un emoji i molt més. Amb Painty, podeu crear contingut informatiu fàcilment dibuixant fletxes i formes en línia que se centren en les parts més significatives d'un text o lloc web. A més, podeu editar el contingut de la pàgina web o la captura de pantalla amb les eines de desenfocament, goma d'esborrar o galleda de pintura.

En resum, Painty és una eina tot en un per a qualsevol persona que vulgui portar la seva experiència de navegació web al següent nivell. Proveu-ho avui mateix i comproveu per vosaltres mateixos com de fàcil és anotar i personalitzar qualsevol pàgina web!

Valorem els teus comentaris! El nostre equip es dedica a oferir-vos la millor experiència de Chrome possible. Si trobeu útil la nostra extensió, considereu donar-li una puntuació de 5 estrelles.

English version:

Paint Tool by Painty is a free Chrome extension to create various drawings that come with brushes, fonts, shapes, and other resources. Simple, easy, and fun to use the paint tool app, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this Chrome extension. Web paint something is user friendly and you could get started painting in a second. If you’d like to learn how to paint, the Painty might be the best thing that happened to you. You can choose custom colors and different line sizes!! 

Our Paint Tool extension has a simple and easy-to-use design. It is not confusing and easily recognizable tool icons  (pencil, paint bucket, eraser, and other tools) are used in the app which makes it easy for everyone to use. Paint online or add information on a webpage to highlight moments, then take a screenshot of a full webpage or just a selected area with an option to download or share it. Fully customized screenshots that could be printed, saved, or sent instantly. 

It contains the tools you need: 

 - Pencil tool - draw custom lines
 - Text tool - add annotation
 - Emoji - add fine emoji on any web pages
 - Bucket fill tool - fill shapes and draw with any color from the palette
 - Line tool - put start and end points to paint a straight line
 - Polygon tool - paint a polygon with the selected line width
 - Ellipse tool - draw an ellipse or a circle with the selected line width
 - Eyedropper tool - pick a color from the web page or your drawings
 - Screenshot tool - allows save screenshot in PNG format

All tools as in MS Paint but only in your browser. 

You can mark shapes with the magic marker, write with the text tool, and more. After you are done. Take screenshots of your work so that your friends can see your creativity as well. Want to share your screen for cases like reporting technical issues, making product demos, or how-to tutorials?  

Here are reasons to choose Painty Tool:

- Hotkeys to each tool.
- Current drawings are automatically saved.
- Save the drawing with a screenshot option.
- Download the image to your PC or print it.
- Crop the necessary area of an image and save it.

Paint on the web and screenshot tool in a simple manner and without any difficulties. Draw online with our new and free extension for Chrome browser. Known as a web paint or paint online tool extension is a useful have for students, teammates, and everyone who works with website content, as you could easily learn or save information, create custom tutorials or paper notes if you’d decided to print it.

❗❗Note: After installing/updating our paint tool, please reload the active tabs in your browser for the extension to work.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Please rate our Painty Tool extension if you like it. Happy painting everyone.
long.cs:
Paint Tool je perfektní nástroj pro každého, kdo chce vyjádřit svou kreativitu. Kreslete na jakoukoli webovou stránku rychle a snadno a dodejte svému procházení novou úroveň výrazu. Pomocí nástrojů Painty můžete přeměnit jakoukoli webovou stránku na své plátno. Posuňte svou kreativitu na další úroveň s naším nástrojem. Tento výkonný nástroj pro malování vám umožňuje kreslit na jakoukoli webovou stránku pomocí různých nástrojů a barev. Navíc je lehký a snadno se používá, čímž přidává novou úroveň kreativity a výrazu do vašeho zážitku z prohlížení. S Painty můžete rychle a snadno vytvářet krásné ilustrace, dělat si poznámky a bavit se.

Jednoduché, snadné a zábavné používání aplikace Painty, můžete si užívat a učit se kreslit v tomto rozšíření pro Chrome. Naše rozšíření má jednoduchý a snadno použitelný design. Není to matoucí a v aplikaci se používají snadno rozpoznatelné ikony nástrojů (tužka, zvýrazňovač, šipky, kbelík s barvou, guma a další nástroje), což usnadňuje použití pro každého.

Nejlepší multitool pro malování online zahrnuje:

🖍️Tužka - nakreslete vlastní čáru s vybranou šířkou a barvou čáry.
🖌️ Zvýrazňovač – nejjednodušší způsob, jak zvýraznit text na libovolné webové stránce.
🎨 Výběr barvy - vyberte barvu z webové stránky nebo svých kreseb a použijte ji ke kreslení.
➖ Čára – namalujte rovnou čáru s vybranou šířkou čáry, průhledností a barvou.
➡️ Šipka - namalujte rovnou čáru se šipkou na konec vybrané šířky čáry, průhlednosti a barvy.
🔗 Polyline - nejlepší způsob, jak malovat libovolnou postavu.
🔳 Obdélník - nakreslete obdélník s vybranou šířkou čáry, průhledností a barvou.
🟡 Kruh - nakreslete kruh nebo elipsu s vybranou šířkou čáry, průhledností a barvou.
🔺 Mnohoúhelník - namalujte mnohoúhelník s vybranou šířkou čáry, průhledností a barvou.
🔤 Text - přidejte text na webovou stránku s vybranou barvou a průhledností.
😀 Emoji - přidejte na webovou stránku zábavné emotikony.
👁️‍🗨️ Rozostření – rozmazání citlivých nebo osobních informací na snímcích obrazovky nebo obrázcích.
🧽 Guma - vymažte část svých kreseb.
🎨 Kbelík barvy - vyplňte oblast vybranou barvou a průhledností.
a více!

Ale to není vše – pomocí Painty New Tab můžete povolit další funkce, jako je přidávání/odebírání záložek a ukládání uložených snímků obrazovky.

Jak mohu použít snímky obrazovky?

Snímky obrazovky nejsou jen praktické, jsou také revoluční, pokud jde o více práce, rychlejší, mohou být extrémně užitečné, když potřebujete předvést něco, co by bylo jinak obtížné vysvětlit slovy. Snímek obrazovky vám může pomoci udělat více práce.

1. Sdílejte
Chce váš spolupracovník váš příspěvek na nové webové stránce, kterou vytvořil? Nebo potřebují, abyste si prohlédli brožuru, kterou si nechali vytisknout? Místo psaní dlouhého e-mailu s úpravami udělejte snímek obrazovky a ohromte svého spolupracovníka vynikající a účinnou zpětnou vazbou.
 
2. Předveďte
Neříkejte jen tak. Ukázat. Ukažte přesně, o čem mluvíte, pomocí snímku obrazovky. Použitím snímku obrazovky, který přesně ukazuje, co máte na mysli, je menší šance, že budete nepochopeni. A to znamená méně zmatků, méně času na vysvětlování a více času zpět ve vašem dni. Například vysvětlete novému zaměstnanci, jak se přihlásit. Místo toho, abyste mu to říkali, můžete mu rychle poslat snímek obrazovky, na který mohou odkazovat znovu a znovu, aniž byste se vás museli opakovaně ptát.
Snímek obrazovky s očíslovanými kroky lze rychle vytvořit a snadno pochopit

3. Ukaž
Pokud jste někdy kontaktovali tým IT nebo webové podpory a nahlásili chybu, pravděpodobně jste byli požádáni o poskytnutí snímku obrazovky. Je to proto, že ne každý má počítač stejný. V závislosti na vašem počítači, operačním systému, na kterém běží, a verzi prohlížeče, kterou používáte, může být způsob, jakým se vám něco zobrazí, úplně jiný pro ostatní. Poskytnutím vizuálního příkladu toho, na co se díváte, pomůžete ostatním přesně vidět, co se děje, a identifikovat, co by mohlo být špatně.

Ať už jste student, profesionál nebo jen někdo, kdo miluje procházení webu, Painty je rozšíření, které musíte mít. Budete mít přístup k řadě pokročilých nástrojů pro poznámky, včetně tužky, zvýrazňovače, výběru barev, šipky, mnohoúhelníku, textu, emotikonů a dalších. S Painty můžete snadno vytvářet informativní obsah kreslením online šipek a tvarů, které se zaměřují na nejdůležitější části textu nebo webu. Navíc můžete upravovat obsah webové stránky nebo snímku obrazovky pomocí nástrojů pro rozmazání, gumu nebo plechovku barvy.

Stručně řečeno, Painty je all-in-one nástroj pro každého, kdo chce posunout své procházení webu na další úroveň. Vyzkoušejte to ještě dnes a přesvědčte se sami, jak snadné je vkládat poznámky a přizpůsobovat jakoukoli webovou stránku!

Vážíme si vaší zpětné vazby! Náš tým se zaměřuje na to, abychom vám nabídli nejlepší možné prostředí Chrome. Pokud považujete naše rozšíření za užitečné, zvažte prosím hodnocení 5 hvězdiček.

English version:

Paint Tool by Painty is a free Chrome extension to create various drawings that come with brushes, fonts, shapes, and other resources. Simple, easy, and fun to use the paint tool app, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this Chrome extension. Web paint something is user friendly and you could get started painting in a second. If you’d like to learn how to paint, the Painty might be the best thing that happened to you. You can choose custom colors and different line sizes!! 

Our Paint Tool extension has a simple and easy-to-use design. It is not confusing and easily recognizable tool icons  (pencil, paint bucket, eraser, and other tools) are used in the app which makes it easy for everyone to use. Paint online or add information on a webpage to highlight moments, then take a screenshot of a full webpage or just a selected area with an option to download or share it. Fully customized screenshots that could be printed, saved, or sent instantly. 

It contains the tools you need: 

 - Pencil tool - draw custom lines
 - Text tool - add annotation
 - Emoji - add fine emoji on any web pages
 - Bucket fill tool - fill shapes and draw with any color from the palette
 - Line tool - put start and end points to paint a straight line
 - Polygon tool - paint a polygon with the selected line width
 - Ellipse tool - draw an ellipse or a circle with the selected line width
 - Eyedropper tool - pick a color from the web page or your drawings
 - Screenshot tool - allows save screenshot in PNG format

All tools as in MS Paint but only in your browser. 

You can mark shapes with the magic marker, write with the text tool, and more. After you are done. Take screenshots of your work so that your friends can see your creativity as well. Want to share your screen for cases like reporting technical issues, making product demos, or how-to tutorials?  

Here are reasons to choose Painty Tool:

- Hotkeys to each tool.
- Current drawings are automatically saved.
- Save the drawing with a screenshot option.
- Download the image to your PC or print it.
- Crop the necessary area of an image and save it.

Paint on the web and screenshot tool in a simple manner and without any difficulties. Draw online with our new and free extension for Chrome browser. Known as a web paint or paint online tool extension is a useful have for students, teammates, and everyone who works with website content, as you could easily learn or save information, create custom tutorials or paper notes if you’d decided to print it.

❗❗Note: After installing/updating our paint tool, please reload the active tabs in your browser for the extension to work.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Please rate our Painty Tool extension if you like it. Happy painting everyone.
long.da:
Paint Tool er det perfekte værktøj til alle, der ønsker at udtrykke deres kreativitet. Tegn på enhver webside hurtigt og nemt og tilføj et nyt udtryksniveau til din browsingoplevelse. Med Painty-værktøjer kan du forvandle enhver webside til dit lærred. Tag din kreativitet til næste niveau med vores værktøj. Dette kraftfulde maleværktøj giver dig mulighed for at tegne på enhver webside med en række værktøjer og farver. Derudover er den let og nem at bruge, og tilføjer et nyt niveau af kreativitet og udtryk til din browsingoplevelse. Med Painty kan du hurtigt og nemt skabe smukke illustrationer, tage noter og have det sjovt.

Enkel, nem og sjov at bruge Painty-appen, du kan nyde og lære at tegne på denne Chrome-udvidelse. Vores udvidelse har et enkelt og brugervenligt design. Det er ikke forvirrende og let genkendelige værktøjsikoner (blyant, highlighter, pile, malerspand, viskelæder og andre værktøjer) bruges i appen, hvilket gør det nemt for alle at bruge.

Det bedste multiværktøj til maling online inkluderer:

🖍️ Blyant - tegn en brugerdefineret linje med den valgte linjebredde og farve.
🖌️ Highlighter - den nemmeste måde at fremhæve tekst på enhver webside.
🎨 Farvevælger - vælg en farve fra websiden eller dine tegninger og brug den til at tegne.
➖ Linje - mal en lige linje med den valgte linjebredde, gennemsigtighed og farve.
➡️ Pil - mal en lige linje med en pil for enden af den valgte linjebredde, gennemsigtighed og farve.
🔗 Polyline - den bedste måde at male en vilkårlig figur på.
🔳 Rektangel - tegn et rektangel med den valgte linjebredde, gennemsigtighed og farve.
🟡 Cirkel - tegn en cirkel eller en ellipse med den valgte linjebredde, gennemsigtighed og farve.
🔺 Polygon - mal en polygon med den valgte linjebredde, gennemsigtighed og farve.
🔤 Tekst - tilføj tekst til websiden med den valgte farve og gennemsigtighed.
😀 Emoji - føj sjove emoji til websiden.
👁️‍🗨️ Sløring - slør følsomme eller personlige oplysninger på skærmbilleder eller billeder.
🧽 Viskelæder - slet en del af dine tegninger.
🎨 Malerspand - fyld et område med valgt farve og gennemsigtighed.
og mere!

Men det er ikke alt - med Painty New Tab kan du aktivere yderligere funktioner såsom tilføjelse/fjernelse af bogmærker og lagring af gemte skærmbilleder.

Hvordan kan jeg bruge skærmbilleder?

Skærmbilleder er ikke bare praktiske, de er også revolutionerende til at få mere arbejde gjort, hurtigere, de kan være yderst hjælpsomme, når du skal demonstrere noget, der ellers ville være svært at forklare med ord. Et skærmbillede kan hjælpe dig med at få mere arbejde gjort.

1. Del
Vil din kollega have dit input til en ny webside, de har sammensat? Eller har de brug for, at du kigger igennem en brochure, de er ved at få trykt? I stedet for at skrive en lang e-mail med redigeringer, tag et skærmbillede og imponer din kollega med fremragende, effektiv feedback.
 
2. Demonstrer
Fortæl det ikke bare. At vise. Demonstrer præcis, hvad du taler om med et skærmbillede. Ved at bruge et skærmbillede, der viser præcis, hvad du mener, er der mindre chance for, at du bliver misforstået. Og det betyder mindre forvirring, mindre tid på at forklare og mere tid tilbage i din dag. Forklar for eksempel en ny medarbejder, hvordan man logger ind. I stedet for at fortælle dem, kan du hurtigt sende dem et skærmbillede, som de kan referere igen og igen uden at skulle spørge dig gentagne gange.
Et skærmbillede med nummererede trin er hurtigt at lave og nemt at forstå

3. Vis
Hvis du nogensinde har kontaktet dit IT- eller websupportteam for at rapportere en fejl, er du sandsynligvis blevet bedt om at give et skærmbillede. Det er fordi ikke alles computer er ens. Afhængigt af din maskine, det operativsystem, den kører, og den browserversion, du er på, kan den måde, noget ser ud for dig på, være helt anderledes for andre. At give et visuelt eksempel på, hvad du ser på, hjælper andre med at se præcis, hvad der foregår, og identificere, hvad der kan gå galt.

Uanset om du er studerende, professionel eller bare en, der elsker at surfe på nettet, er Painty en must-have-udvidelse. Du har adgang til en række avancerede annoteringsværktøjer, herunder en blyant, highlighter, farvevælger, pil, polygon, tekst, emoji og mere. Med Painty kan du nemt skabe informativt indhold ved at tegne online pile og former, der fokuserer på de vigtigste dele af en tekst eller hjemmeside. Derudover kan du redigere indholdet på websiden eller skærmbilledet med værktøjet sløring, viskelæder eller malerspand.

Kort sagt, Painty er et alt-i-et værktøj for alle, der ønsker at tage deres web-browsing-oplevelse til næste niveau. Prøv det i dag, og se selv, hvor nemt det er at kommentere og tilpasse enhver webside!

Vi værdsætter din feedback! Vores team er dedikeret til at tilbyde dig den bedst mulige Chrome-oplevelse. Hvis du finder vores udvidelse nyttig, så overvej at give den en 5-stjernet vurdering.

long.de:
Paint Tool ist das perfekte Werkzeug für alle, die ihrer Kreativität Ausdruck verleihen möchten. Zeichnen Sie schnell und einfach auf jeder Webseite und verleihen Sie Ihrem Surferlebnis eine neue Ausdrucksebene. Mit Painty-Tools können Sie jede Webseite in Ihre Leinwand verwandeln. Bringen Sie Ihre Kreativität mit unserem Tool auf die nächste Stufe. Mit diesem leistungsstarken Malwerkzeug können Sie mit einer Vielzahl von Werkzeugen und Farben auf jeder Webseite zeichnen. Darüber hinaus ist es leichtgewichtig und benutzerfreundlich und verleiht Ihrem Surferlebnis ein neues Maß an Kreativität und Ausdruck. Mit Painty können Sie schnell und einfach schöne Illustrationen erstellen, Notizen machen und Spaß haben.

Die Verwendung der Painty-App ist einfach, leicht und macht Spaß. Mit dieser Chrome-Erweiterung können Sie das Zeichnen genießen und lernen. Unsere Erweiterung hat ein einfaches und benutzerfreundliches Design. Es ist nicht verwirrend und in der App werden leicht erkennbare Werkzeugsymbole (Bleistift, Textmarker, Pfeile, Farbeimer, Radiergummi und andere Werkzeuge) verwendet, was die Verwendung für jedermann erleichtert.

Das beste Multitool zum Malen online umfasst:

🖍️ Bleistift – Zeichnen Sie eine benutzerdefinierte Linie mit der ausgewählten Linienbreite und -farbe.
🖌️ Textmarker – der einfachste Weg, Text auf jeder Webseite hervorzuheben.
🎨 Farbauswahl – Wählen Sie eine Farbe von der Webseite oder Ihren Zeichnungen aus und verwenden Sie sie zum Zeichnen.
➖ Linie – Zeichnen Sie eine gerade Linie mit der ausgewählten Linienbreite, Transparenz und Farbe.
➡️ Pfeil – Zeichnen Sie eine gerade Linie mit einem Pfeil am Ende der ausgewählten Linienbreite, Transparenz und Farbe.
🔗 Polylinie – der beste Weg, eine beliebige Figur zu malen.
🔳 Rechteck – Zeichnen Sie ein Rechteck mit der ausgewählten Linienstärke, Transparenz und Farbe.
🟡 Kreis – Zeichnen Sie einen Kreis oder eine Ellipse mit der ausgewählten Linienstärke, Transparenz und Farbe.
🔺 Polygon – Malen Sie ein Polygon mit der ausgewählten Linienstärke, Transparenz und Farbe.
🔤 Text – Fügen Sie der Webseite Text mit der ausgewählten Farbe und Transparenz hinzu.
😀 Emoji – füge der Webseite lustige Emojis hinzu.
👁️‍🗨️ Unschärfe – Verwischen Sie vertrauliche oder persönliche Informationen auf Screenshots oder Bildern.
🧽 Radiergummi – lösche einen Teil deiner Zeichnungen.
🎨 Farbeimer – Füllen Sie einen Bereich mit ausgewählter Farbe und Transparenz.
und mehr!

Aber das ist noch nicht alles – mit dem Painty New Tab können Sie zusätzliche Funktionen wie das Hinzufügen/Entfernen von Lesezeichen und das Speichern gespeicherter Screenshots aktivieren.

Wie kann ich Screenshots verwenden?

Screenshots sind nicht nur praktisch, sie sind auch revolutionär, wenn es darum geht, mehr Arbeit schneller zu erledigen. Sie können äußerst hilfreich sein, wenn Sie etwas demonstrieren müssen, das sonst nur schwer mit Worten zu erklären wäre. Ein Screenshot kann Ihnen dabei helfen, mehr Arbeit zu erledigen.

1. Teilen
Möchte Ihr Kollege Ihren Beitrag zu einer neuen Webseite, die er zusammengestellt hat? Oder müssen Sie sich eine Broschüre ansehen, die sie gerade drucken lassen? Anstatt eine lange E-Mail mit Änderungen zu schreiben, machen Sie einen Screenshot und begeistern Sie Ihre Kollegen mit hervorragendem, effizientem Feedback.
 
2. Demonstrieren
Erzähl es nicht einfach. Zeigen. Zeigen Sie mit einem Screenshot genau, wovon Sie sprechen. Wenn Sie einen Screenshot verwenden, der genau zeigt, was Sie meinen, ist die Wahrscheinlichkeit geringer, dass Sie missverstanden werden. Und das bedeutet weniger Verwirrung, weniger Zeit für Erklärungen und mehr Zeit zurück in den Tag. Erklären Sie beispielsweise einem neuen Mitarbeiter, wie er sich einloggt. Anstatt es ihm zu sagen, können Sie ihm schnell einen Screenshot schicken, auf den er immer wieder zurückgreifen kann, ohne Sie immer wieder fragen zu müssen.
Ein Screenshot mit nummerierten Schritten ist schnell erstellt und leicht zu verstehen

3. Zeigen
Wenn Sie jemals Ihr IT- oder Web-Support-Team kontaktiert haben, um einen Fehler zu melden, wurden Sie wahrscheinlich gebeten, einen Screenshot bereitzustellen. Das liegt daran, dass nicht jeder Computer gleich ist. Abhängig von Ihrem Computer, dem darauf ausgeführten Betriebssystem und der Browserversion, die Sie verwenden, kann die Art und Weise, wie etwas für Sie angezeigt wird, für andere völlig anders sein. Wenn Sie ein visuelles Beispiel dafür geben, was Sie sehen, können andere genau sehen, was vor sich geht, und erkennen, was möglicherweise schief läuft.

Egal, ob Sie Student, Berufstätiger oder einfach nur jemand sind, der gerne im Internet surft, Painty ist eine unverzichtbare Erweiterung. Sie haben Zugriff auf eine Reihe erweiterter Anmerkungswerkzeuge, darunter Bleistift, Textmarker, Farbauswahl, Pfeil, Polygon, Text, Emoji und mehr. Mit Painty können Sie ganz einfach informative Inhalte erstellen, indem Sie online Pfeile und Formen zeichnen, die sich auf die wichtigsten Teile eines Textes oder einer Website konzentrieren. Darüber hinaus können Sie den Inhalt der Webseite oder des Screenshots mit den Werkzeugen „Unschärfe“, „Radierer“ oder „Farbeimer“ bearbeiten.

Kurz gesagt, Painty ist ein All-in-One-Tool für alle, die ihr Surferlebnis im Internet auf die nächste Stufe heben möchten. Probieren Sie es noch heute aus und überzeugen Sie sich selbst, wie einfach es ist, jede Webseite mit Anmerkungen zu versehen und anzupassen!

Wir schätzen Ihr Feedback! Unser Team ist bestrebt, Ihnen das bestmögliche Chrome-Erlebnis zu bieten. Wenn Sie unsere Erweiterung hilfreich finden, denken Sie bitte darüber nach, ihr eine 5-Sterne-Bewertung zu geben.

long.el:
Το Paint Tool είναι το τέλειο εργαλείο για όποιον θέλει να εκφράσει τη δημιουργικότητά του. Σχεδιάστε γρήγορα και εύκολα σε οποιαδήποτε ιστοσελίδα και προσθέστε ένα νέο επίπεδο έκφρασης στην εμπειρία περιήγησής σας. Με τα εργαλεία Painty, μπορείτε να μετατρέψετε οποιαδήποτε ιστοσελίδα σε καμβά σας. Ανεβάστε τη δημιουργικότητά σας στο επόμενο επίπεδο με το εργαλείο μας. Αυτό το ισχυρό εργαλείο ζωγραφικής σάς επιτρέπει να σχεδιάζετε σε οποιαδήποτε ιστοσελίδα με μια ποικιλία εργαλείων και χρωμάτων. Επιπλέον, είναι ελαφρύ και εύκολο στη χρήση, προσθέτοντας ένα νέο επίπεδο δημιουργικότητας και έκφρασης στην εμπειρία περιήγησής σας. Με το Painty, μπορείτε γρήγορα και εύκολα να δημιουργήσετε όμορφες εικόνες, να κρατήσετε σημειώσεις και να διασκεδάσετε.

Απλή, εύκολη και διασκεδαστική στη χρήση της εφαρμογής Painty, μπορείτε να απολαύσετε και να μάθετε να σχεδιάζετε σε αυτήν την επέκταση του Chrome. Η επέκτασή μας έχει απλό και εύχρηστο σχεδιασμό. Δεν προκαλεί σύγχυση και χρησιμοποιούνται εύκολα αναγνωρίσιμα εικονίδια εργαλείων (μολύβι, επισήμανση, βέλη, κουβάς ζωγραφικής, γόμα και άλλα εργαλεία) που το καθιστά εύκολο στη χρήση από όλους.

Το καλύτερο πολυεργαλείο για βαφή online περιλαμβάνει:

🖍️ Μολύβι - σχεδιάστε μια προσαρμοσμένη γραμμή με το επιλεγμένο πλάτος και χρώμα γραμμής.
🖌️ Επισήμανση - ο ευκολότερος τρόπος για να επισημάνετε κείμενο σε οποιαδήποτε ιστοσελίδα.
🎨 Color Picker - επιλέξτε ένα χρώμα από την ιστοσελίδα ή τα σχέδιά σας και χρησιμοποιήστε το για σχέδιο.
➖ Γραμμή - ζωγραφίστε μια ευθεία γραμμή με το επιλεγμένο πλάτος γραμμής, διαφάνεια και χρώμα.
➡️ Βέλος - ζωγραφίστε μια ευθεία γραμμή με ένα βέλος στο τέλος του επιλεγμένου πλάτους, διαφάνειας και χρώματος γραμμής.
🔗 Polyline - ο καλύτερος τρόπος για να ζωγραφίσετε μια αυθαίρετη φιγούρα.
🔳 Ορθογώνιο - σχεδιάστε ένα ορθογώνιο με το επιλεγμένο πλάτος γραμμής, διαφάνεια και χρώμα.
🟡 Κύκλος - σχεδιάστε έναν κύκλο ή μια έλλειψη με το επιλεγμένο πλάτος γραμμής, διαφάνεια και χρώμα.
🔺 Πολύγωνο - ζωγραφίστε ένα πολύγωνο με το επιλεγμένο πλάτος γραμμής, διαφάνεια και χρώμα.
🔤 Κείμενο - προσθέστε κείμενο στην ιστοσελίδα με το επιλεγμένο χρώμα και διαφάνεια.
😀 Emoji - προσθέστε διασκεδαστικά emoji στην ιστοσελίδα.
👁️‍🗨️ Θάμπωμα - θόλωμα ευαίσθητων ή προσωπικών πληροφοριών σε στιγμιότυπα οθόνης ή εικόνες.
🧽 Γόμα - διαγράψτε μέρος των σχεδίων σας.
🎨 Κάδος βαφής - γεμίστε μια περιοχή με επιλεγμένο χρώμα και διαφάνεια.
κι αλλα!

Αλλά αυτό δεν είναι μόνο - με τη νέα καρτέλα Painty, μπορείτε να ενεργοποιήσετε πρόσθετες λειτουργίες, όπως η προσθήκη/αφαίρεση σελιδοδεικτών και η αποθήκευση αποθηκευμένων στιγμιότυπων οθόνης.

Πώς μπορώ να χρησιμοποιήσω στιγμιότυπα οθόνης;

Τα στιγμιότυπα οθόνης δεν είναι απλώς εύχρηστα, είναι επίσης επαναστατικά για την εκτέλεση περισσότερων εργασιών, γρηγορότερα, μπορεί να είναι εξαιρετικά χρήσιμα όταν χρειάζεται να δείξετε κάτι που διαφορετικά θα ήταν δύσκολο να εξηγηθεί με λόγια. Ένα στιγμιότυπο οθόνης μπορεί να σας βοηθήσει να ολοκληρώσετε περισσότερη δουλειά.

1. Μοιραστείτε
Θέλει ο συνάδελφός σας τη συμβολή σας σε μια νέα ιστοσελίδα που έχει δημιουργήσει; Ή μήπως σας χρειάζονται να κοιτάξετε πάνω από ένα φυλλάδιο που τυπώνουν; Αντί να γράψετε ένα μακροσκελές email με επεξεργασίες, τραβήξτε ένα στιγμιότυπο οθόνης και εντυπωσιάστε τον συνάδελφό σας με εξαιρετικά, αποτελεσματικά σχόλια.
 
2. Επίδειξη
Μην πείτε μόνο. Προβολή. Δείξτε τι ακριβώς μιλάτε με ένα στιγμιότυπο οθόνης. Χρησιμοποιώντας ένα στιγμιότυπο οθόνης που δείχνει ακριβώς τι εννοείτε, υπάρχει μικρότερη πιθανότητα να παρεξηγηθείτε. Και αυτό σημαίνει λιγότερη σύγχυση, λιγότερο χρόνο για εξηγήσεις και περισσότερο χρόνο πίσω στην ημέρα σας. Για παράδειγμα, εξηγήστε σε έναν νέο υπάλληλο πώς να συνδεθείτε. Αντί να του το πείτε, μπορείτε να του στείλετε γρήγορα ένα στιγμιότυπο οθόνης στο οποίο μπορούν να αναφέρουν ξανά και ξανά χωρίς να χρειάζεται να σας ρωτούν επανειλημμένα.
Ένα στιγμιότυπο οθόνης με αριθμημένα βήματα είναι γρήγορο και κατανοητό

3. Εμφάνιση
Εάν έχετε επικοινωνήσει ποτέ με την ομάδα υποστήριξης IT ή Ιστού για να αναφέρετε ένα σφάλμα, πιθανότατα σας έχει ζητηθεί να παράσχετε ένα στιγμιότυπο οθόνης. Αυτό συμβαίνει επειδή ο υπολογιστής όλων δεν είναι ίδιος. Ανάλογα με το μηχάνημά σας, το λειτουργικό σύστημα που εκτελεί και την έκδοση του προγράμματος περιήγησης στην οποία χρησιμοποιείτε, ο τρόπος με τον οποίο εμφανίζεται κάτι για εσάς μπορεί να είναι εντελώς διαφορετικός για άλλους. Η παροχή ενός οπτικού παραδείγματος αυτού που κοιτάτε βοηθά τους άλλους να δουν ακριβώς τι συμβαίνει και να εντοπίσουν τι μπορεί να πάει στραβά.

Είτε είστε φοιτητής, είτε επαγγελματίας ή απλά κάποιος που του αρέσει η περιήγηση στο διαδίκτυο, το Painty είναι μια απαραίτητη επέκταση. Θα έχετε πρόσβαση σε μια σειρά προηγμένων εργαλείων σχολιασμού, όπως μολύβι, επισήμανση, επιλογή χρώματος, βέλος, πολύγωνο, κείμενο, emoji και άλλα. Με το Painty, μπορείτε εύκολα να δημιουργήσετε ενημερωτικό περιεχόμενο σχεδιάζοντας ηλεκτρονικά βέλη και σχήματα που εστιάζουν στα πιο σημαντικά μέρη ενός κειμένου ή ενός ιστότοπου. Επιπλέον, μπορείτε να επεξεργαστείτε το περιεχόμενο στην ιστοσελίδα ή στιγμιότυπο οθόνης με τα εργαλεία θολώματος, γόμας ή κουβά ζωγραφικής.

Με λίγα λόγια, το Painty είναι ένα εργαλείο all-in-one για όποιον θέλει να απογειώσει την εμπειρία περιήγησής του στο web. Δοκιμάστε το σήμερα και δείτε μόνοι σας πόσο εύκολο είναι να σχολιάσετε και να προσαρμόσετε οποιαδήποτε ιστοσελίδα!

Εκτιμούμε τα σχόλιά σας! Η ομάδα μας είναι αφοσιωμένη στο να σας προσφέρει την καλύτερη δυνατή εμπειρία Chrome. Εάν βρίσκετε χρήσιμη την επέκτασή μας, εξετάστε το ενδεχόμενο να της δώσετε μια βαθμολογία 5 αστέρων.

English version:

Web Paint is one of the best painting and drawing tools for Chrome! Draw beautiful drawings to unleash your creativity and entertain yourself at the same time. It's simple and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this app. Web Paint Tool is a lightweight and completely free Chrome extension that can be used for educational purposes and for introducing anyone to drawing right from your browser. It can be used to practice the alphabet and numbers and paintings while educating.

This tool has a simple and easy-to-use design. It is not confusing and easily recognisable icons are used in the app which makes it easy and quite simple to use. This is a single-screen and one-click app, you land on the app and can start using it as soon as you click on the app logo, no annoying welcome screens or button clicks are required to start working on the app.

Painty key features

- Paint is one of the best painting or drawing apps to unleash their creativity.
- You can draw beautiful pictures.
- Using Paint you can save and share the picture through social media.
- Offers multiple brush and eraser sizes for a great experience.
- Lightweight paint tool that hardly takes any space on your device.

Paint Tool is a free tool to create various drawings that come loaded with brushes, fonts, shapes, and other resources. Simple, easy, and fun to use, you can enjoy and learn drawing on this Chrome extension.

Our Paint Tool extension has a simple and easy-to-use design. It is not confusing and easily recognizable tool icons  (pencil, paint bucket, eraser, and other tools) are used in the app which makes it easy for everyone to use. Paint directly online or add information on a webpage to highlight moments, then take a screenshot of a full webpage or just a selected area with an option to download or share it. 

What is a screenshot?

A screenshot, sometimes referred to as a screencap or screen capture, is an image that shows the contents of a computer display. Screenshots let you capture exactly what you’re seeing on your screen to share with others or reference later.

Taking, saving, and sharing screenshots can be extremely helpful. Some insist that the screenshot is the most important thing on the internet. But how can a simple picture of your screen be so vital? Well, you see, screenshots often act as a new-age artifact. They serve as a way to prove to others that you’re seeing the crazy stuff you’re seeing.
Not only do they help you prove your case, they also help you archive the past. 

For example, they can help you capture what a website looked like before the latest brand refresh, that weird error message you got a couple of months ago, or even a juicy gossip article you don’t want to risk forgetting.

How can I use screenshots?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster. About the belief that screenshots can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. 

Screenshots can help you get more work done:

1. Collaborate with others
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate steps to perform a function
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. For example, explain to a new employee how to log in. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.

3. Show exactly what’s happening
If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, and the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others.

Screenshot can be useful for many situations: 

- Sharing screen images with friends on social media.
- Showcasing software for a review.
- Demonstrating how to do something in a tutorial. 
- Showing an error message or software issue for technical support troubleshooting.
- Saving snippets of anything that cannot be easily printed.

Note: After installation/updating Painty Tool, please reload the active tabs in your browser for the extension to work.

and more!

But that's not all - with the Painty New Tab, you can enable additional features such as adding/removing bookmarks and storing saved screenshots.

How can I use screenshots?

Screenshots aren’t just handy, they’re also revolutionary to getting more work done, faster, they can be extremely helpful when you need to demonstrate something that would otherwise be difficult to explain in words. A screenshot can help you get more work done.

1. Share
Does your coworker want your input on a new webpage they’ve put together? Or do they need you to look over a brochure they’re having printed? Instead of writing a lengthy email with edits, take a screenshot and wow your coworker with excellent, efficient feedback.
 
2. Demonstrate
Don’t just tell. Show. Demonstrate exactly what you’re talking about with a screenshot. By using a screenshot that shows exactly what you mean, there’s less chance that you’ll be misunderstood. And that means less confusion, less time explaining, and more time back in your day. For example, explain to a new employee how to log in. Instead of telling them, you can quickly send them a screenshot that they can reference again and again without having to repeatedly ask you.
A screenshot with numbered steps is quick to make and easy to understand

3. Show
If you’ve ever contacted your IT or Web Support Team to report a bug, you’ve likely been asked to provide a screenshot. That’s because not everyone’s computer is the same. Depending on your machine, the operating system it’s running, and the browser version you’re on, the way something appears for you could be completely different for others. Providing a visual example of what you’re looking at helps others see exactly what’s going on and identify what might be going wrong.
